ygData.subject: RE: Abit bout the guild thing.
ygData.msgSnippet:
Oh, forget to reply this part:

 the guild should be about helping each other (esp when u really need it) 
and hunting

Yep, at
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, forget to reply this part:

> the guild should be about helping each other (esp when u really need it)
and hunting
> together at times...

Yep, at 'times', but not 'ALL time' ;)
Like I said, yes, shld help one another. But u mentioned 1 SOS and all
have to drop wat they doing to come and help, isn't it too 'ground
shaking'? ;)

> if u wanna swap stuff... thats more of a favor rather than a
> SOS... pls differentiate the 2 things! if u have 2 bloody chars... and 1
is
> > high level... then is easy lah... just give consent and let ya other
char
> > come in n loot lor... but if someone seriously needs help... help
should be
> > given... THAST IS WHATS DIFFERENT FROM OTHER GUILD... if u think that
> > camping a stupid shield is more impt that this matter... then i give up
> on this guild liaoz....

I'm not the only one who think of dropping stuffs and let my other char
pick it, Les has done it before too when I wasn't online to help him last
time (initially we r the 1st 2 HE wiz and we dunno other kakis yet). I'm
using the swap item as an example, cool down man ;) I'm just trying to
point out that, to u, ya matter is the most impt, but to other, they will
to feel that way for their own matter. Back to my illustration, if I've
camp the shield for 5 hrs, and I know it will be dropped anytime in the
next hr, while someone need a help to retrieve his corpse, and this CAN be
done by other kakis online, I see no reason why ALL (including myself) have
to drop what they are doing and come to ya rescue. Whether in RL or in EQ,
we do have to be 'efficient' sometimes. ;) Helping a member to get his
corpse is not something that required ALL other kakis to participate. Just
like in UO, do u respond to all SOS icq? ;)

Well if u still insist when there is a SOS msg, and expect ALL kakis online
to rush to him, then I will perosnally think that my 5hrs camping is more
important than saving that stupid corpse ;)

I'm also very flexible in such things, but general guidelines must still be
lay down. Ah-hoc cases and individual members' atttitude and playing style
must also be considered. If you can name me any guild in EQ where ALL will
rush to any SOS msg send in guildsay, tell me, I also wanan join ;)

Ziltus
